scripts.test: MOCHA_GREP=asdf MOCHA_INVERT=true MOCHA_REPORTER=spec TEST_WATCH=1 DEBUG='meteor-mocha:*' DEBUG_FD=1 DEBUG_COLORS=1 meteor test --full-app --driver-package keyscores:mocha-browser
scripts.dispatch: meteor npm install && TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=nightmare meteor test --once --full-app --driver-package dispatch:mocha
